pkgmetadata.longdescription: # opentypespec[![PyPi Status]][PyPi][PyPi Status]: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/opentypespec.svg[PyPi]: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/opentypespecThis package currently provides the ``opentypespec.tags`` module, whichexports ``FEATURE_TAGS``, ``SCRIPT_TAGS``, ``LANGUAGE_TAGS`` and``BASELINE_TAGS`` dictionaries, representing data from theLayout Tag Registry (section 6.4 of the Open Font Format specification):```python >>> from opentypespec.tags import SCRIPT_TAGS, LANGUAGE_TAGS >>> SCRIPT_TAGS["adlm"] {'name': 'Adlam'} >>> LANGUAGE_TAGS["ECR "] {'name': 'Eastern Cree', 'iso639': ['crj', 'crl']}```* Data derived from the ISO/IEC 14496-22 “Open Font Format” specification.* The Python code in this module is licensed under the Apache Software License 2.0## History### 1.8.4 (2021-06-28)* First release on PyPI.
